detail_desc: Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with anti-slip protectors.

Shirt in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, French front and a yoke and darts at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body's physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Sandals with straps at the front and elastic heel straps. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Fully lined bikini top with hole-patterned, underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape, and ties at the back of the neck.
Sleeveless, cropped top in stretch cotton jersey with a small stand-up collar and V-neck at the front. Opening with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening at the back of the neck.
Bodysuit in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and press-studs at the crotch.
Short, straight-cut T-shirt dress in sturdy cotton jersey with dropped shoulders and short sleeves.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.

Set with a top and pair of leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with long sleeves, a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), and a ribbed neckline. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif, lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short fitted top in viscose jersey with long sleeves and a visible seam down the front. Slightly shorter front panel with a knot detail at the hem.
Shorts in hard-washed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a concealed zip.
Blouse in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, button placket and short, wide sleeves with gathers at the shoulders. Narrow, elasticated seam at the back of the waist and a rounded hem.
Short, off-the-shoulder, straight-cut dress in sturdy jersey with elastication and a wide flounce at the top and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Vest top in slub linen jersey with a deep neckline at the front.
Jumper in a soft, textured, pima cotton knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with a wide neckline, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and an asymmetric skirt with sewn-on flounces for added volume. Lined.
Teddy coat in faux fur with a collar, concealed press-studs down the front and patch front pockets. Lined.
Small bag in imitation leather with a quilted front and zip at the top. Adjustable waist belt with an oval metal buckle and one inner compartment. Lined. Size 4x12x18 cm.
Fishnet tights with an elasticated waist.
Straight T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey.
Trainers in mesh with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Trainers with elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders and long sleeves with eyelets and crossover satin ribbons. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
String body in soft, ribbed jersey with short sleeves, a seam under the bust and press-studs at the crotch.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Long, sleeveless dress in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck with a sewn-in wrapover and a seam at the waist with ties at one side. Unlined.

Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and small V-neck opening at the top. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, an elasticated seam under the bust, and a rounded hem.
Knee-length shorts in soft washed cotton with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets with a button.
Jumper in soft, jacquard-knit cotton with buttons on the shoulders, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lace shortie briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Slightly shorter jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved top in a soft, rib-knit viscose blend with an open back with ties at the hem.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a print motif on the front, gathers at the shoulders and ribbing in a contrasting colour around the neckline.
Sandals with covered block heels and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8 cm.

Set with a jumper and pair of trousers in a cotton knit. Jumper with a round, roll-edge neckline, buttons at the back of one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with a ribbed drawstring waist and ribbing at the hems.
Long top in cotton jersey with a hood, stand-up collar at the front and dropped shoulders with short sleeves. Large kangaroo pocket, seams at the back and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Top in an airy cotton weave with short sleeves and a small opening with a heart-shaped button at the back of the neck. Broderie anglaise and a scalloped trim around the sleeves and hem.
Elasticated fabric waist belt with a shell-shaped metal buckle and hook-and-eye fastener. Width approx. 5 cm.
3/4-length trousers in jersey with covered elastication at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Washed cotton twill trousers in a regular fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Shaping briefs in microfibre with a high waist, laser-cut edges and a lined gusset. The briefs have a lightly sculpting effect on the waist, seat and hips.

Leggings in a viscose and silk weave with a high waist, zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastener and welt back pockets. Legs with sewn-in creases down the front and an opening with a concealed zip at the hems.

Straight-cut jacket in cotton corduroy with a faux shearling collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Lining in faux shearling and a quilted weave.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed cotton jersey with a round neckline and a placket with press-studs.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
Slim-fit joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and stripes down the sides of the legs.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a rounded, woven collar, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Trim at the hem in a cotton weave.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1-10Y) and a straight-cut hem. For the matching parent’s T-shirt, look for 0721930.

Body in jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck with a decorative pompom trim. Seam at the front of the waist with a crocheted lace trim, and concealed press-studs at the crotch. Unlined.
Baby Exclusive. Long-sleeved Henley top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist and skinny legs.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with padded cups, wide lightly padded shoulder straps that cross at the back and an elastic hem with hook-and-eye fasteners. Extra firm support.
Top in soft, patterned cotton jersey with long sleeves, an open chest pocket and slits at the hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in a viscose crêpe weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, hole-patterned lace down the front and a flounce at the hem.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool and glittery threads. Dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves, wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a funnel collar with a decorative drawstring, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a grandad collar, button placket and long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs. Yoke at the back and slits in the sides. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Padded mittens in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with sewn-on appliqués and a print at the top. Elasticated seam at the wrists, inner ribbing and a plastic hook-and-eye fastener to keep the mittens together. Thinsulate™ lining.

Ankle-length trousers in a slightly stretchy weave made from a viscose blend. Zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a regular waist. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
5-pocket, low-rise, skinny-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with a zip fly and slim legs with printed stripes down the sides.
Tunic in an airy viscose weave with a collar, concealed button placket and side pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Scarf in an airy, textured weave with raw edges.
Set with a short-sleeved dress and pair of 3/4-length leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey. Dress with a flounce at the hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Dress in Tencel™ lyocell twill with frills down the front and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with elastication and a frill at the cuffs. Unlined.
Lined, non-wired triangle bikini top with ties at the back and back of the neck and cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support.
Cardigan in a soft fine knit with a rounded collar, buttons down the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Lined hood, kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Two pairs of all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey with short sleeves and short legs. Ribbing around the neckline and a concealed zip down the front that continues down one leg and has a chin guard at the top. One patterned pair.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with an opening at the top and a small stand-up collar with ties at the front. Long puff sleeves, narrow cuffs with a covered button, and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Blouse in a plumeti cotton weave with a small stand-up collar, button placket and pin-tucks and inset lace trims at the top. Short, flounced sleeves and a yoke with decorative gathers at the back.
Short dress in slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and a gently flared skirt.

Jacket knitted in soft, thermal fleece with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and kangaroo pockets. Jersey trim around the pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Long-sleeved tops in soft jersey with a round neck and long sleeves. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Set with two short-sleeved tops and two pairs of trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey. Tops with lapped shoulders. Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
